definitions.text: extraordinarily large in size or extent or amount or power or degree; ; ; ; - Walter Lippman
examples: a tremendous fact in human experience; that a whole civilization should be dependent on technology
a plane took off with a tremendous noise

definitions.text: extraordinarily good or great ; used especially as intensifiers
examples: a fantastic trip to the Orient
a marvelous collection of rare books
had a rattling conversation about politics

definitions.text: extreme in degree or extent or amount or impact
examples: spent a frightful amount of money
